name: Legendary Mahjong
description: Enjoy a new way to play Mahjong, with varied styles of challenged as you progress. Have the option to customize your game with the layout and tiles of your choice. Get set for a brilliant Mahjong Game with an accompanying campaign to get you well entertained.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP/Windows Vista/Windows 7/Windows 8/Windows 10 Processor: 1.4 GHz Memory: 2048 MB RAM Graphics: 512MB VRAM DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 223 MB available space
